QuestData.Title: Ongo'longo's Revenge
QuestData.Description: Ongo'longo was one of us. What outsiders called a Dire Troll, but he was a Revantusk, and a proud warrior like all of us!$B$BThen the Vilebranch took him. They keep him chained up in a pit at the top of Jintha'Alor, made to dance for their sick amusement.$B$BNo chains can hold Ongo'longo. All you need to do is raise his temper, $n. Fight him until he's enraged enough to remember his true spirit and break free... and then get out of the way!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Get him angry, then get out of his way!
QuestData.LogDescription: Fight Ongo'longo until he breaks free.
QuestData.RewardText: I wish I could have been there to see it, $n! I'll have to hear the story from Ongo'longo himself when this is over.
